13"2016-06-24 12:48:57 Beatrice: Hi I lost my job and haven't been contributing but my question is regards my mum who lost her job and decided to move up country.Its been almost six years and I was wondering if its possible for her to claim her benefits though she is not yet 50 years.
2016-06-24 12:53:31 System assistant: Samali Nalwoga has accepted the chat!
2016-06-24 12:53:31 Samali Nalwoga: Welcome to NSSF live chat, hold on while we attend to your query.
2016-06-24 12:54:09 Samali Nalwoga: Sorry about loss of your job.
2016-06-24 12:55:19 Samali Nalwoga: In regards to your mother, if she is not yet 50 years of age, she may claim if;
2016-06-24 12:56:44 Samali Nalwoga: She is suffering from critical illnesses like HIV/AIDS or Cancer, physical or mental incapacitation.
2016-06-24 12:58:04 Samali Nalwoga: Or if she leaves the country permanently.
2016-06-24 13:16:25 System assistant: snalwoga (snalwoga@nssfug.org) has closed the chat!
